meanings.definition: A person or organization that sends unsolicited messages or advertisements, especially over the internet.
meanings.sent1: The spammers flooded my inbox with unwanted emails.
meanings.sent2: Online spammers often try to sell fake products through emails.
meanings.sent3: The spammers must think I need a million dollars from a prince in Nigeria!
meanings.sent4: The spammers are like persistent salespeople knocking on a digital door.
meanings.sent5: Beware of spammers lurking in the depths of the internet, waiting to pounce on unsuspecting users.

meanings.definition: The act of sending unsolicited messages or advertisements, especially over the internet.
meanings.sent1: Receiving spam emails is frustrating because of the spammers behind them.
meanings.sent2: Spammers often use automated tools to send out mass messages.
meanings.sent3: I wish spammers would focus on sending cat videos instead of ads.
meanings.sent4: The flood of messages from spammers is like a never-ending digital waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The world of the internet is constantly battling against the invasion of spammers and their unwanted content.
